data.title: Famous People Who Died in 1213
data.meta_description: Famous deaths in 1213. Learn about 5 historical figures, notable people and celebrities who died in 1213 or search by date or keyword.
data.text:
Tamar of Georgia, Queen of Georgia (1184-1213) presided over Gerogia's Golden Age, dies

Wibert of Gembloers, benediction/writer/abbot of Gembloers, dies

Pedro II [el Catolico], King of Aragon, dies in battle

Gertrude of Merania, wife of Andrew II of Hungary (murdered) (b. 1185)

John of Matha, French Christian saint and founder of the Order of the Most Holy Trinity dedicated to ransoming Christians captured by North African marauders, dies at 53
